description: The Isle of Cycling Association wants speed limits in urban areas to be reduced to 20mph.
title: Call for low Manx speed limits to help cyclists 'feel safe'
title_page: Call for low Manx speed limits to help cyclists 'feel safe' - BBC News
maintext: In it, the association also asked for extra signage that "clearly indicated" to drivers that they were also used "by many vulnerable road users".
